arguments.name: silent
arguments.description: Whether to send messages silently (no notification will be triggered on the destination clients)

arguments.name: background
arguments.description: Whether to send the message in background

arguments.name: withMyScore
arguments.description: When forwarding games, whether to include your score in the game

arguments.name: randomId
arguments.description: Random ID to prevent resending of messages
